content: hurry up hat this is my go-to in a hurry need a hat right now pattern usually knit for my son who loses or gives away his warm hats with great regularity it can be knit with any super bulky weight yarn that knits to about 10 sts in 4 inches or a couple of chunky strands held together works great as well knit it plain or knit it striped it knits fast either way the crown shaping is a little bit different and gives the hat a nice finish especially when striped materials drops andes beige/grey or drops snow pink/grey 100 m in one or two colours 8 0 mm us #11 circs and dpns markers and the regular notions gauge 10 sts to 4 inches size one size abbreviations k2tog knit 2 sts together borm beginning of round marker pattern cast-on 48 sts being careful not to twist the cast-on place borm and join into a round work ribbed body as follows ©l et issier d esi gn s l y net t e m e ek n a na imo b c ca na da 2 0 2 0 p a ge 1 | 2 every round k1 p2 k2 11 times end p2 k1 work ribbing for approx 10 inches crown shaping round 1 *k1 p2 k2 2 times p1 k2tog pm repeat from * 4 times 44 sts on following rounds slip markers as you come to them markers help track the decrease lines round 2 *k1 p2 k2 2 times k2tog repeat from * 4 times 40 sts round 3 *k1 p2 k2 p2 k1 k2tog repeat from * 4 times 36 sts round 4 *k1 p2 k2 p2 k2tog repeat from * 4 times 32 sts round 5 *k1 p2 k2 p1 k2tog repeat from * 4 times 28 sts round 6 *k1 p2 k2 k2tog repeat from * 4 times 24 sts round 7 *k1 p2 k1 k2tog repeat from * 4 times 20 sts round 8 *k1 p2 k2tog repeat from * 4 times 16 sts round 9 *k1 p1 k2tog repeat from * 4 times 12 sts round 10 *k1 k2tog repeat from * 4 times 8 sts finishing cut yarn leaving a 6 to 8-inch tail using tapestry needle push yarn to center of hat and weave in ends do not block ©l et issier d esi gn s l y net t e m e ek n a na imo b c ca na da 2 0 2 0 p age 2 | 2
